fields.name: DisplayHeader1
fields.fieldText:
CSA Inquiry Builder

{!GetTemplate.Name}

fields.name: Termsofuse1
fields.fieldText:
Please read and agree to the terms to proceed

Let's get started!


The CSA Inquiry Builder asks simple questions about your dispute. It’s free, anonymous, and confidential.


The CSA Inquiry Builder doesn't provide legal advice. But it gives you legal information based on your answers. It even has template letters that you can send someone to try and resolve a dispute on your own.


It also classifies your dispute and gives you the right to submit online application form for your situation.


Disclaimers and terms of use


The content in this site is not legal advice. The CSA Inquiry Builder can't provide legal advice. If you have questions about whether you should make a claim, you may want to contact a lawyer or other legal services provider.


This CSA Inquiry Builder content is subject to change and is updated regularly.

fields.name: TermsofUse2
fields.fieldText: I agree to the CSA Inquiry Builder Terms of Use

validationRule.errorMessage: You must agree to the terms to continue.
